page.title: 09Churchgate St Parish Records
page.content:
{ Burials}from 1984 to 1985
18 people, aged between 35 and 93, were buried in this period. There were 10 male and 8 female deaths. The average age at death was 70 years. { { Marriages }in 1983
These are the only records available. There were 19 marriages in 1983. Most people were married between June and October. February was also popular.
{ Baptisms}from 1984 to 1985
11 were baptised in the year. Most were six months old. Only children of churchgoers may be baptised.
The{registers}above may be seen at St Mary's Church, Churchgate Street.
